summary: This document appears to be a financial record related to a mortgage application, detailing information about the loan officer, borrower, and settlement agent involved in a refinancing transaction. It includes personal details, loan amounts, and property information.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is identified as the loan officer handling the mortgage application.

persons.name: Ronald J Antonelli
persons.context: Ronald J Antonelli is associated with the Law Office handling the settlement for the mortgage.

persons.name: Vicki Greene
persons.context: Vicki Greene is mentioned as the sender and funder related to the mortgage application.

connections.description: Joann Brown is the loan officer working with Vicki Greene, who is involved in the funding process.
Ronald J Antonelli's law office is involved in the settlement process for the mortgage application handled by Vicki Greene.

events.title: Mortgage Application Date
events.description: The application for the mortgage was submitted on this date.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing for the mortgage refinancing is scheduled for this date.

keyFacts: The mortgage application was for a refinancing purpose with a loan amount of $325,000.
The property associated with the mortgage has an appraised value of $620,000.
The interest rate for the loan is set at 3.000% with a term of 180 months.
